::FZ::

FZ approaches Halucigen, looking him over. "Welcome to the Iron Fist," he says as he approaches. "I am as close to Zardus as available right now. He's in a meeting, but I'm his clone, persay."

As he says that, his comm retrieves the the message that the Iron Fist had intercepted, reading over it. It was interesting, though he didn't know who the bot was. He forms a transmission, and sends it to where the message originated from, with no outside activity to indicate that he was doing anything but waiting for Halucigen's reply.

The transmission reads: "This is Zardus. I have recieved your transmission, and am awaiting further contact from you. I'm sure that when you are complete, we can work well together."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> Halucigen was surpirsed.  "How does he know I want to kill the 
> Destrons." he thought to himself, where no other could possibly 
> hear him.  Then opening a comm link to this Dark One he said 
> "Yea, sure , umm, great one, I'll be there in a jiffy. "  
> However he did not move as he waited for FZ.
